name: CVE-2009-4804
description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Calendar Base (cal) extension before 1.1.1 for TYPO3, when Internet Explorer 6 is used, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via "search parameters."
